description.lang: The ABUS Z-Wave Multisensor includes 4 sensors in one device: motion sensor, thermometer, hygrometer and light sensor. Thanks to battery operation, the Multisensor can be installed very easily (alternative operation via USB). The Multisensor also provides extensive configuration options like the transmission interval and sensitivity of the motion detector and much more.

Z-Wave Plus Lifeline 1. Notification Report. Sensor will send Notification Report when Motion Detection Unknown Location and (Event inactive). 2. Multilevel Sensor Report Sensor will send Multilevel Sensor Report (Temperature, humidity, luminance) interval of 2 hours. 3. Battery Report. Sensor will send Battery Report when the battery level is low and the battery reports value is 0xFF. 4. Device Reset Locally.
Send Basic Set when PIR trigger
Low Battery Power Level of alarm threshold values
Set 101 ~ 104 to default

name.lang: The interval time of sending the temperature reporting

description.lang: the temperature reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the temperature reporting is 1 seconds to 31 days= 2678400 seconds

name.lang: The interval time of sending the humidity reporting.

description.lang: the humidity reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the humidity reporting is 1 seconds to 31 days = 2678400 seconds

name.lang: The interval time of sending the luminance reporting.

description.lang: the luminance reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the luminance reporting is 1 seconds to 31 days = 2678400 seconds

name.lang: The interval time of sending the battery level reporting.

description.lang: the battery level reporting is disabled
The interval time of sending the battery level reporting is 1 seconds to 31 days = 2678400 seconds

name.lang: Enable 111 ~ 114 temperature/humidity/luminance/ battery level change reporting.

description.lang: Disabled
Enabled
the temperature change threshold value(unit 0.1)
humidity change threshold value(unit %)
luminance change threshold is 32767 to 65528
luminance change threshold is 0 to 32766
battery level change threshold value(unit)%
0x0A indicates the highest sensitivity, 0x00 means off PIR detection function.

name.lang: PIR triggers the waiting time value

description.lang: the waiting time of the PIR triggering in Seconds

name.lang: Whether the BASIC SET command is sent after the PIR is triggered

description.lang: Unabled
Enabled

name.lang: PIR triggers the correspondence between the value of the Basic set and the PIR state

description.lang: PIR triggers Send the basic set command 0xff PIR alarm release send the basic set command 0x00
PIR triggers send the basic set command 0x00 PIR alarm release send the basic set command 0xff.
